main event: Two objects were observed moving in parallel at an altitude of approximately 1.5 miles in Chesterland, Ohio.
interesting points: The objects appeared stationary for 3-5 minutes before moving towards the horizon and disappearing downward., Ground radar tracked an object approximately 15 miles south of Chesterland at an altitude of 30,000 feet for 20 minutes., The B-47 was vectored to intercept the object but it disappeared from radar before visual range was achieved., The objects were reported to be 30 ft in length and 20 ft in width., The sighting occurred during a significant UFO investigation by Project Blue Book.
witness description: Capt. Robert M. Drew and the crew of a B-47
